name: Horse
description: A four-legged creature domesticated by many cultures for use as a beast of burden, a means of transportation, and a war mount.

0.name: Kick
0.description: The horse kicks at a target with its hooves.

0.name: Beast of Burden
0.description: A horse can carry 80kg as a light load. With another 80kg (160kg), it carries a medium load, and at 240kg it carries a heavy load. It can't carry more than a heavy load.

1.name: Warhorse
1.description: A warhorse gains +2 to MGT and FOR, and increaes its load limits to 90/180/270kg for light/medium/heavy loads.
